name: Afghani CBD
description: Afghani CBD is a high-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani grown by Canadian LP Tilray. Named after its geographic origin Afghani CBD has relaxing, therapeutic properties that have shown potential to help those suffering with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders.
descriptionPlain: Afghani CBD is a high-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani grown by Canadian LP Tilray. Named after its geographic origin Afghani CBD has relaxing, therapeutic properties that have shown potential to help those suffering with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders.

highlightedReviews.text:
This was the second strain I have ever tried, since I'm a new medical patient due to a back injury and nerve pain. 

There was no high feeling at all from this strain, just a sense of calm and relaxation. It is a lot like Cannatonic yet it leaves me with less of the very sleepy feelings that Cannatonic gave me. It reduces inflammation very quickly, so it helps remove a source of my pain but it doesn't get rid of the pain completely. It allows me to be pain free while in a resting position where I would otherwise always be in pain. If I overstretch or bend a certain way, I will still notice some pain. It also helps with GI issues.

The smell of the bud is an intense blueberry/grape high note with a low early spring floral pine note. I'd recommend this to any medical patient, especially people who are new to cannabis, seeking anti-inflammatory properties and a nice calming effect.

I am currently smoking on a batch of CBD afghani from my dispensary green rhino .. i think it's fire . I have DP/DR as well as anxiety and PTSD , i can not handle high THC strains any more . I immediately felt healing properties with my first pull off this batch . The smell is very clean , fresh , strong and has great cannabis pheromones coming off it . I feel my mind relax as well i am getting caught in thoughts from time to time as well . I feel calm , sleepy , comfy and i have some what of a dry mouth after a couple more tears off the glass piece . Clear mind with a fuzzy focus , tending 1 special task is great on this . I have no heavy eyes , just some warmth , light body , light but slightly heavy head depending how much is consumed - how tired you become . I feel a new fullness in my head , this might work for head aches ! great any time smoke but better at night or during a good amount of time you have free to relax . I would not have much sex on this but would love to have sensual oral  . Overall great strain and plant!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: CBD Shark, Afghan Hawaiian, 13 Dawgs, Damn Sour, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain database now exceeds 1,200 varieties, but our collection is far from finished. These ten strains are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the Explorer!
 
   1. CBD Shark
Characteristics of CBD Shark:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Cross between Shark Shock and an unknown high-CBD variety
Fruity, herbal aroma
Clear-headed, soothing effects
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation

 
   2. Afghan Hawaiian
Characteristics of Afghan Hawaiian:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between UK Cheese and Lavender
Sweet and earthy cheese aroma
Euphoric and relaxing
May help with neurological disorders and spasticity

 
   3. 13 Dawgs
Characteristics of 13 Dawgs:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between G13 and Chemdawg
Woody, citrus aroma
Happy, relaxed, focused effects
May help with depression and appetite loss

 
   4. Damn Sour
Characteristics of Damn Sour:

Mostly sativa strain
Bred from Sage N Sour genetics
Sour, diesel aroma
Uplifting and intensely euphoric
May help with aches and appetite loss

 
   5. Afghani CBD
Characteristics of Afghani CBD:

High-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani
Earthy, hashy aroma
Relaxing, therapeutic properties
May help with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders

 
   6. Aberdeen
Characteristics of Aberdeen:

Variety of Agent Orange
Cross between Orange Velvet and Jack the Ripper
Sweet orange and citrus aroma
Happy, uplifting effects
May help with anxiety, migraines, and gastrointestinal disorders

 
   7. Jenni
Characteristics of Jenni:

Mostly sativa strain
Modest THC level suitable for novice consumers
Sweet, fruity aroma
Soothing, clear-headed effects

 
   8. Bedica
Characteristics of Bedica:

Mostly indica strain
Sedating, calming effects
May help with stress and insomnia

 
   9. Avi
Characteristics of Avi:

50/50 high-CBD hybrid strain
Sweet fruit and berry aroma
Relaxing and calming effects
May help with body aches and pains

 
   10. Argyle
Characteristics of Argyle:

Indica-dominant high-CBD hybrid
Variety of Nordle (cross between Afghani and Sensi Star)
Herbal, fruity aroma
Mellow, calming buzz
May help with pain and muscle spasms

description: Afghani CBD is a high-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani grown by Canadian LP Tilray. Named after its geographic origin Afghani CBD has relaxing, therapeutic properties that have shown potential to help those suffering with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders.

highlightedReviews.text:

There was no high feeling at all from this strain, just a sense of calm and relaxation. It is a lot like Cannatonic yet it leaves me with less of the very sleepy feelings that Cannatonic gave me. It reduces inflammation very quickly, so it helps remove a source of my pain but it doesn't get rid of the pain completely. I am currently smoking on a batch of CBD afghani from my dispensary green rhino .. i think it's fire . I have DP/DR as well as anxiety and PTSD , i can not handle high THC strains any more . I immediately felt healing properties with my first pull off this batch . The smell is very clean , fresh , strong and has great cannabis pheromones coming off it . I feel my mind relax as well i am getting caught in thoughts from time to time as well . I feel calm , sleepy , comfy and i have some what of a dry mouth after a couple more tears off the glass piece . Clear mind with a fuzzy focus , tending 1 special task is great on this . I have no heavy eyes , just some warmth , light body , light but slightly heavy head depending how much is consumed - how tired you become . I feel a new fullness in my head , this might work for head aches ! great any time smoke but better at night or during a good amount of time you have free to relax . I would not have much sex on this but would love to have sensual oral  . Overall great strain and plant!

The smell of the bud is an intense blueberry/grape high note with a low early spring floral pine note. I'd recommend this to any medical patient, especially people who are new to cannabis, seeking anti-inflammatory properties and a nice calming effect.

I am currently smoking on a batch of CBD afghani from my dispensary green rhino .. i think it's fire . I have DP/DR as well as anxiety and PTSD , i can not handle high THC strains any more . I immediately felt healing properties with my first pull off this batch . The smell is very clean , fresh , strong and has great cannabis pheromones coming off it . I feel my mind relax as well i am getting caught in thoughts from time to time as well . I feel calm , sleepy , comfy and i have some what of a dry mouth after a couple more tears off the glass piece . Clear mind with a fuzzy focus , tending 1 special task is great on this . I have no heavy eyes , just some warmth , light body , light but slightly heavy head depending how much is consumed - how tired you become . I feel a new fullness in my head , this might work for head aches ! great any time smoke but better at night or during a good amount of time you have free to relax . I would not have much sex on this but would love to have sensual oral  . Overall great strain and plant!

highlightedReviews.text:
This was the second strain I have ever tried, since I'm a new medical patient due to a back injury and nerve pain. 

There was no high feeling at all from this strain, just a sense of calm and relaxation. It is a lot like Cannatonic yet it leaves me with less of the very sleepy feelings that Cannatonic gave me. It reduces inflammation very quickly, so it helps remove a source of my pain but it doesn't get rid of the pain completely. It allows me to be pain free while in a resting position where I would otherwise always be in pain. If I overstretch or bend a certain way, I will still notice some pain. It also helps with GI issues.

The smell of the bud is an intense blueberry/grape high note with a low early spring floral pine note. I'd recommend this to any medical patient, especially people who are new to cannabis, seeking anti-inflammatory properties and a nice calming effect.

I am currently smoking on a batch of CBD afghani from my dispensary green rhino .. i think it's fire . I have DP/DR as well as anxiety and PTSD , i can not handle high THC strains any more . I immediately felt healing properties with my first pull off this batch . The smell is very clean , fresh , strong and has great cannabis pheromones coming off it . I feel my mind relax as well i am getting caught in thoughts from time to time as well . I feel calm , sleepy , comfy and i have some what of a dry mouth after a couple more tears off the glass piece . Clear mind with a fuzzy focus , tending 1 special task is great on this . I have no heavy eyes , just some warmth , light body , light but slightly heavy head depending how much is consumed - how tired you become . I feel a new fullness in my head , this might work for head aches ! great any time smoke but better at night or during a good amount of time you have free to relax . I would not have much sex on this but would love to have sensual oral  . Overall great strain and plant!

I feel a new fullness in my head , this might work for head aches ! great any time smoke but better at night or during a good amount of time you have free to relax . I would not have much sex on this but would love to have sensual oral  . Overall great strain and plant!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: CBD Shark, Afghan Hawaiian, 13 Dawgs, Damn Sour, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain database now exceeds 1,200 varieties, but our collection is far from finished. These ten strains are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the Explorer!
 
   1. CBD Shark
Characteristics of CBD Shark:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Cross between Shark Shock and an unknown high-CBD variety
Fruity, herbal aroma
Clear-headed, soothing effects
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation

 
   2. Afghan Hawaiian
Characteristics of Afghan Hawaiian:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between UK Cheese and Lavender
Sweet and earthy cheese aroma
Euphoric and relaxing
May help with neurological disorders and spasticity

 
   3. 13 Dawgs
Characteristics of 13 Dawgs:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between G13 and Chemdawg
Woody, citrus aroma
Happy, relaxed, focused effects
May help with depression and appetite loss

 
   4. Damn Sour
Characteristics of Damn Sour:

Mostly sativa strain
Bred from Sage N Sour genetics
Sour, diesel aroma
Uplifting and intensely euphoric
May help with aches and appetite loss

 
   5. Afghani CBD
Characteristics of Afghani CBD:

High-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani
Earthy, hashy aroma
Relaxing, therapeutic properties
May help with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders

 
   6. Aberdeen
Characteristics of Aberdeen:

Variety of Agent Orange
Cross between Orange Velvet and Jack the Ripper
Sweet orange and citrus aroma
Happy, uplifting effects
May help with anxiety, migraines, and gastrointestinal disorders

 
   7. Jenni
Characteristics of Jenni:

Mostly sativa strain
Modest THC level suitable for novice consumers
Sweet, fruity aroma
Soothing, clear-headed effects

 
   8. Bedica
Characteristics of Bedica:

Mostly indica strain
Sedating, calming effects
May help with stress and insomnia

 
   9. Avi
Characteristics of Avi:

50/50 high-CBD hybrid strain
Sweet fruit and berry aroma
Relaxing and calming effects
May help with body aches and pains

 
   10. Argyle
Characteristics of Argyle:

Indica-dominant high-CBD hybrid
Variety of Nordle (cross between Afghani and Sensi Star)
Herbal, fruity aroma
Mellow, calming buzz
May help with pain and muscle spasms

name: Afghani CBD
description: Afghani CBD is a high-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani grown by Canadian LP Tilray. Named after its geographic origin Afghani CBD has relaxing, therapeutic properties that have shown potential to help those suffering with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders.
descriptionPlain: Afghani CBD is a high-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani grown by Canadian LP Tilray. Named after its geographic origin Afghani CBD has relaxing, therapeutic properties that have shown potential to help those suffering with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders.

highlightedReviews.text:
This was the second strain I have ever tried, since I'm a new medical patient due to a back injury and nerve pain. 

There was no high feeling at all from this strain, just a sense of calm and relaxation. It is a lot like Cannatonic yet it leaves me with less of the very sleepy feelings that Cannatonic gave me. It reduces inflammation very quickly, so it helps remove a source of my pain but it doesn't get rid of the pain completely. It allows me to be pain free while in a resting position where I would otherwise always be in pain. If I overstretch or bend a certain way, I will still notice some pain. It also helps with GI issues.

The smell of the bud is an intense blueberry/grape high note with a low early spring floral pine note. I'd recommend this to any medical patient, especially people who are new to cannabis, seeking anti-inflammatory properties and a nice calming effect.

I am currently smoking on a batch of CBD afghani from my dispensary green rhino .. i think it's fire . I have DP/DR as well as anxiety and PTSD , i can not handle high THC strains any more . I immediately felt healing properties with my first pull off this batch . The smell is very clean , fresh , strong and has great cannabis pheromones coming off it . I feel my mind relax as well i am getting caught in thoughts from time to time as well . I feel calm , sleepy , comfy and i have some what of a dry mouth after a couple more tears off the glass piece . Clear mind with a fuzzy focus , tending 1 special task is great on this . I have no heavy eyes , just some warmth , light body , light but slightly heavy head depending how much is consumed - how tired you become . I feel a new fullness in my head , this might work for head aches ! great any time smoke but better at night or during a good amount of time you have free to relax . I would not have much sex on this but would love to have sensual oral  . Overall great strain and plant!
